title: Typowiki How-To
content:
I happened to press (two times)the “revision” button on the How-To-section regarding BlueScale. Didnt know what really happened, but what I wanted was to add my point of views below the current BlueScale How-To, not revert anything (what ever that means..)

Did I destroy something?

 [‹ Fontstruct](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828053801/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43997 "Go to previous forum topic") ["Aesthetics of Ukrainian Lettering" new book ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828053801/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44376 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Goran Soderstrom
